2018170.name: Golf Assassin: Break of Egghead Mafia Demo
2018170.description: Long ago, all creatures of the pixel world lived together in harmony. Then everything changed when the Egghead mafia attacked. And there is only one can stop them and save the pixel world - Golf Assassin. But the Egghead mafia never sleeps. You will have to face many creative traps and devices designed to thwart you, from spikes to mecha suits.
